channel.title: Help with a few things (Devo 7.0)
channel.description:
Im with the source Devo 7.0, please help me with:
1.) Changing home 2.) If someone first started, how would I add 30k into their inv and full bronze 3.) NPC dialouge
ty

item.title: Help with a few things (Devo 7.0)
item.dc:creator: @Project_Evolution Project Evolution
item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

  1. Simply go to your Player class (Player.java) and search for,
// initial x and y coordinates of the player

Under that you should see some teleport variables. Edit those to change your spawning (when players first log in/die).

  1. Go into your client class (client.java). Make a boolean variable like so,
private boolean hasStarter = false;

Then find,

for (int a = 0; a < lastMessage.length; a++) { lastMessage[a] = ""; }
And below that put,

if (hasStarter == false) { // put your addItem() here hasStarter = true; }
Im not going to tell you how to add the items, but I gave you a hint in the comment.

Read full topic
